name: G-Mode Archives 51: Trio the Punch
summary:
"Trio the Punch" is an arcade action game released by Data East in 1990.

Players choose one of the unique characters, such as "Santos" the tough guy, "Kamakura-kun" the ninja, and "Rosesub" the swordsman.

If you defeat the enemies in the stage and get a heart, and defeat the boss who appears by collecting all the hearts, you will clear the stage.

Of course, "Mr. Chin's roulette corner" is also alive and well.
If you draw a hit, you can benefit from increasing your HP and increasing your attack power, so let's push your eyes so that you can get a more effective bonus.
